title: 谁会在客户端里插入背景音乐？
author: gxy13
txt_content: 就是在玩MC时放的背景音乐

replies.author: Craftwolves
replies.txt_content:
1.7.x-1.8.x 见 http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=421087
低版本 见 http://tieba.baidu.com/p/4316493319

replies.author: TNT嘉音
replies.txt_content: 打开游戏文件夹\.minecraft\sounds\music，里面有几个背景音乐，默认是顺序播放的。

replies.author: gxy13
replies.txt_content:
Center_xiaofei 发表于 2016-9-30 22:43
版本为多少？
版本是1.10.2

replies.author: 冰凌暮雨
replies.txt_content:
修改材质包，然后用指令播放～
附教程一枚～http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-461762-1-1.html
